Name: Mayla Gonzales
Description:
The suspects thought Mayla was a cisgender female and became mad when they found out that she was trans. Her skull was smashed with a 2x2 wooden beam.

TvT partner organisation APTN & Philstar, 09.11.2016

Name: Lili
Description:
Lili was shot dead on the night of 2nd November. She was a corn seller.

> Murder in the city of Laranjeiras last night 02/11/2016.
>
> According to information, the victim was a corn seller in Areia Branca [and a trans woman].

*Note that it is possible that the photo included in this report may not be the same person, as it also appears in two reports (e.g. http://www.gilsondeoliveira.com.br/noticia/10445/adolescentes-sao-mortos-com-emprego-de-arma-de-fogo-na-regiao-sul-de-sergipe) about the murder of Tâmara Natalia Gomes dos Santos, 16, and José Mateus de Oliveira Santos, 15, inside a residence in Arauá, around 90km away.*

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Informações Policiais e Astra LGBT / SE, 02.11.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/04/20284/

https://www.facebook.com/informacoespoliciais/posts/1501955406485183

https://web.archive.org/web/20170331234505/http://redetransbrasil.org/assassinatos.html

Name: Lorena
Description:
Lorena was shot several times outside a bar on Rua Antônio Pituba in the Ouro Preto neighborhood of Arapiraca. She died at the scene.

>  A [trans woman] was murdered on the morning of Thursday (3), near a bar, on Rua Antônio Pituba, in the neighborhood of Ouro Preto, Arapiraca. According to the first reports, the victim identified only as Lorena, was hit by several gunshots and died at the scene. 
>
> Lorena had a knife around her waist and, according to folk, practiced small thefts in the area. One of them would have happened minutes before being hit by the shots, which hit her head and leg.
>
> The Mobile Emergency Response Service (Samu) was called, but the victim died on the spot.

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/03/lorena-tiros-al-arapiraca/

https://goqueer.blogspot.com/2016/12/lgbt-people-killed-in-brazil-oct-17-to.html

http://diarioarapiraca.com.br/editoria/policia/imagens-fortes:-travesti-e-assassinada-a-tiros-proximo-a-bar-em-arapiraca/3/21321

http://www.jaenoticia.com.br/noticia/34788/Travesti-e-assassinada-a-tiros-no-bairro-0uro-Preto-em-Arapiraca

http://www.alagoas24horas.com.br/1012249/travesti-e-morta-tiros-proximo-bar-em-arapiraca/

Name: I. M. de Sousa
Description:
I. was shot in the back and chest on the banks of the Paraíba river in Campos dos Goytacazes. A 16 year old suspect was detained by the police.

> A [trans woman] was shot dead in Campos. The crime occurred on the banks of the Paraiba River and victim was shot twice, once in the back and once in the chest. A murder suspect, the 16-year-old JJMC, was arrested by military police. A revolver with three shell casings ammunition was found buried after the minor revealed the spot to the police.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Identidade Mandacaru, 03.11.2016 

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/03/i-m-de-sousa-18-anos-tiros-rj-campos-dos-goytacazes/

https://goqueer.blogspot.com/2016/12/lgbt-people-killed-in-brazil-oct-17-to.html

http://campos24horas.com.br/portal/travesti-e-assassinado-em-plena-luz-do-dia-nesta-quinta-em-campos/

https://web.archive.org/web/20161109064412/http://www.clickcampos.com:80/2016/11/03/travesti-encontrado-morto-proximo-ao-sesi-em-guarus/

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim’s body was found in woods in a state of decomposition. Her arms and legs had been tied.

> An unidentified body was found late Thursday (3), in a forest between Jardim Ipanema and campus II of the University of São Paulo (USP), in São Carlos .
>
> According to police, a person passing by spotted the half-naked corpse and called 190. When the team arrived, they found that the body was tied up and in an advanced state of decomposition.
>
> The Technical-Scientific Police and the delegate on duty were called to analyze the area and the body was taken to the Legal Medical Institute (IML).

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Sao Carlos agora.com.br, 03.11.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/03/nao-identificada-a-esclarecer-sp-sao-carlos/

Description:
Noony was shot. She died in hospital the next day.

Name: Alynda Leitte
Description:
Alynda was suffocated with a sheet and found by her sister. A neighbour said she had been seen with a tall white man.

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/alynda.leitte.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was run over on a a bridge in the Escandón neighborhood, Miguel Hidalgo delegation. The vehicle responsible failed to stop.

http://www.excelsior.com.mx/comunidad/2016/11/07/1126744

Name: Pitty
Description:
Pitty was stabbed 15 times at around 5:30am on Tuesday 8th November.

> In the municipality of Paragominas in the southeast of Pará dawn on Tuesday (8) began bloodily with the death of a [trans woman].
>
> According to information gathered, the victim was known as “Pitty” and was stabbed to death in the Nagibão neighborhood at around 5:30 am.
>
> Police are conducting investigations to reach those responsible for the crime.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Diario on line, 08.11.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/08/pity-facadas-pa-paragominas/

https://transfofa.blogspot.com/2016/11/portugal-20-anos-depois-lara-crespo-o.html

https://www.diarioonline.com.br/noticias/policia/noticia-385183-travesti-e-morta-a-facadas-em-paragominas.html

https://jorgequadros.com.br/paragominas-travesti-assassinado-facadas-no-bairro-nagibao/ [BROKEN LINK]

Name: Tara
Description:
Tara was was found severely burnt outside of a police station. She died in hospital.

Police had stopped her the night before and accused her of soliciting sex work while she charged her phone at a 24-hour store. They confiscated her phone and the keys to her vehicle. According to a friend, when she argued she was assaulted and taken to the police station for questioning, where they allegedly assaulted her again.

The local community believes that the police were responsible for burning her to death.

TvT partner organisation APTN & The News Minute, 21.08.2016

https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/transgender-woman-dies-chennai-she-was-found-burnt-outside-police-station-52639

Name: Day Azevedo
Description:
Day was shot 9 times while travelling on a motorcycle and died from internal bleeding. He also went by the name Day Mininão. 

> The trans-man Day Azevedo was killed with nine shots last Thursday (10) in Caicó, Rio Grande do Norte. He was a motorcycle taxi driver, lived in a hostel, and was also known as  Day Mininão.
>
> According to local media, Day was in Samanáu neighborhood with a woman - identified as Ana Paula - when he was approached by the killers. The two fell in front of the Fire Department, where Day was shot with more than six times The victim was rescued by the SAMU team and sent by ambulance to Natal, but along the way he had complications and was admitted to the hospital of  Currais Novos. Ana suffered no gunshot wounds, but is under observation.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Caiaco digital.com, 10.11.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/09/day-azevedo-tiros-rn-caico/

http://www.nlucon.com/2016/11/homem-trans-day-azevedo-e-assassinado.html

http://lucieliohenrique.com/morre-caicoense-vitima-de-tiros-na-noite-dessa-quarta-feira-na-zona-norte/

http://www.plantaocaico.com.br/2016/11/morre-caicoense-vitima-de-tiros-na.html

https://www.reporterserido.com/2016/11/morre-albergada-caicoense-vitima-de.html

Name: Niurkeli Carguaitongo
Description:
Niurkeli (also known as Niurka) was an Ecuadorian sex worker who disappeared after travelling from Paris to Nantes on 15th October 2016. On 21st October her colleague reported her disappearance to the police in Nantes, and her death was confirmed on 12th November.

Niurkeli’s friends found a piece of paper with the phone number of the person they suspected had murdered her and gave the number to the police.

Strass (Syndicat du TRAvail Sexuel or the Syndicate of Sex Workers) condemned her murder:

http://strass-syndicat.org/le-strass/qui-sommes-nous/

> "Since 2014, Niurka suffered from precarious and deteriorating working conditions in Paris and had to travel regularly to the provinces to maintain her income levels. We attribute the circumstances of her death to a context in which sex workers are forced to take more and more risks by traveling to increasingly insecure and insecure places.
> 
> "We are tired of the deaths of our colleagues succeeding one another in general indifference and demanding that justice be done. Niurka lived in Paris with her mother, who always supported and respected her, and it was she who asked STRASS for us to be a civil party during the trial, which we will do."

http://strass-syndicat.org/justice-pour-niurkeli-assassinee/

https://www.lepotcommun.fr/pot/

Name: Celeste
Description:
Celeste was found by neighbours on the street with multiple wounds in her arms and legs. She was taken to the hospital but died there.

Before losing consciousness she gave her name as “Celeste”, but her full identity is unknown.

http://www.cadena3.com/contenido/2016/11/17/Misteriosa-muerte-en-Cordoba-de-una-joven-travesti-173080.asp

Name: Rafael Guilherme Silva Pereira
Description:
Rafael was shot several times.

> Near midnight, a [trans man] was shot to death in Lomba do Pinheiro, in the eastern part of the city. The victim was identified as [deadname] Silva Pereira, who used the social name of Rafael and had a criminal record. The body had several gunshot wounds.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & G1 Rio Grande do Sul, 16.11.2016

Name: Evelyn Zulma
Description:
Evelyn was murdered inside her home. She was an activist of the OTRANS organisation and had interim protective measures from a case in which she had intervened.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticias Terra, 03.12.2016

Name: Munich Oliveira Moreno
Description:
We don’t know what happened to Munich, but some details were apparently posted to Facebook by a friend.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Facebook Gustavo Augusto Costa, 18.11.2016

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was found beaten to death on the street.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & La Pagina, 20.11.2016

Name: E. J. Pereira Gomes
Description:
E. was shot 5 times at some time during the night. Her body was found by residents in the morning.

> According to police reports, the girl was reportedly shot at least five times during the night. The body was removed to the Legal Medical Institute (IML) of Campos. The case was registered at the 146th PD / Guarus, where so far no one has been arrested.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Click Campos

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/21/e-j-pereira-gomes-26-anos-tiros-146adp-rj-campos-dos-goytacazes/

Name: Hannia Camacho Rodriguez
Description:
Hannia was shot three times in the chest outside the "El Senderito" bar in Ciudad Victoria at about 3am.

Her killer was a man who had argued with her earlier in the evening. He left and later returned, shooting her at point-blank range and then fleeing on a motorcycle.

She was taken immediately by a friend to the General Hospital of Tamaulipas, where she died from her injuries. 

Hannia was part of a soccer team and last June he participated in the National Gay Soccer competition, in which her team won third place. She had received several medals and trophies for her sporting performance.

http://desastre.mx/mexico/asesinan-a-mujer-trans-futbolista-en-tamaulipas/

https://www.proceso.com.mx/463959/asesinan-a-campeona-trans-futbol-en-ciudad-victoria

Name: Madeleine Delbom
Description:
Madeleine was strangled and stabbed to death by a group of people who owed money to her after being lured to a remote location for a barbecue.

https://www.aftonbladet.se/nyheter/krim/article23932335.ab

https://www.expressen.se/nyheter/de-doms-for-mordet-pa-madeleine-i-langshyttan/

Name: Paola Bracho
Description:
Paola was killed by three men who took her into a room, suffocated her with tape and fled with cell phones and money.

> The transvestite [deadname] Silveira Mamede, 25, better known as “Paola Bracho”, was killed by strangulation inside her house, at Rua da Paz, Crespo neighborhood in the South Zone of Manaus. The crime occurred around 5:30 pm on Thursday (24).
>
> According to her family, the perpetrators of the murder are three boys who have been staying with the victim since last Tuesday (22). “They were living there with her, but we only knew them by sight. After killing [Paola], the three fled, ”said the victim's sister Karen Bianca Mamede.
>
> Friends of “Paola” said that before committing the crime, the trio went to the victim's mother's house with her to eat. Two of the perpetrators were named as Bruno and Jhonny - a third party has not yet been identified.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Expresso AM, 24.11.2016

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2016/11/24/paola-bracho-cabeleireira-25-anos-estrangulada-am-manaus/

https://www.acritica.com/channels/hoje/news/conhecida-como-paola-bracho-travesti-e-morta-a-facadas-no-bairro-crespo

https://expressoam.com/conhecida-como-paola-bracho-travesti-e-assassinado-no-bairro-crespo/

Name: Michele Rios
Description:
Michele was murdered inside her own house. No other details are known.

Her Facebook profile is at https://www.facebook.com/michele.rios.5680.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil

Name: Alejandro Polanco Botero
Description:
Alejandro was a lawyer. He was shot in the head 4 times by a hitman while opening a car door for his assistant.

http://www.cronicadelquindio.com/noticia-completa-titulo-asesinaron_en_pereira_al_abogado_quindiano_alejandro_polanco_botero-seccion-la_judicial-nota-105072.htm
